scripts.prepare:hoodi: npm run generate-const:hoodi && npm run generate-yaml:hoodi && npm run generate-types:hoodi
scripts.build:hoodi: npm run prepare:hoodi && npm run generate-wasm:hoodi
scripts.test:hoodi: npm run prepare:hoodi && npm run generate-tests-yaml:hoodi && npm run patch-schema && graph test
scripts.deploy-stage:hoodi: npm run prepare:hoodi && npm run deploy network:hoodi env:stage
scripts.deploy-prod:hoodi: npm run prepare:hoodi && npm run deploy network:hoodi env:prod
scripts.prepare:mainnet: npm run generate-const:mainnet && npm run generate-yaml:mainnet && npm run generate-types:mainnet
scripts.build:mainnet: npm run prepare:mainnet && npm run generate-wasm:mainnet
scripts.test:mainnet: npm run prepare:mainnet && npm run generate-tests-yaml:mainnet && npm run patch-schema && graph test -d
scripts.deploy-stage:mainnet: npm run prepare:mainnet && npm run deploy network:mainnet env:stage
scripts.deploy-prod:mainnet: npm run prepare:mainnet && npm run deploy network:mainnet env:prod
scripts.prepare:gnosis: npm run generate-const:gnosis && npm run generate-yaml:gnosis && npm run generate-types:gnosis
scripts.build:gnosis: npm run prepare:gnosis && npm run generate-wasm:gnosis
scripts.test:gnosis: npm run prepare:gnosis && npm run generate-tests-yaml:gnosis && npm run patch-schema && graph test
scripts.deploy-stage:gnosis: npm run prepare:gnosis && npm run deploy network:gnosis env:stage
scripts.deploy-prod:gnosis: npm run prepare:gnosis && npm run deploy network:gnosis env:prod
